con:testCase.name: /TeeOff/v1/Search/GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries

con:testStep.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries (No Results - Past Date)

con:restRequest.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries (No Results - Past Date)

con:assertion.name: CourseID is the same as the requested courseId

con:testStep.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries (compared to other method calls)

con:restRequest.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries (compared to other method calls)

con:assertion.name: CourseID should match the requested courseId
MinPlayers is same with GetTeeTimesByCourse's MinPlayer
MaxPlayers is same with GetTeeTimesByCourse's MaxPlayer
JsonPath Match - No Tee times should return price lower than $30.00
JsonPath Match - No Tee times should return price higher than $100.00
JsonPath Match - No Tee times should return distance less than 10mi
JsonPath Match - No Tee times should return distance more than 60mi
JsonPath Match - TotalTeeTimes should be more than 0
JsonPath Match - All results must be 9 Holes
teetimes count == TotalTeeTimes in GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries(Filtered by 9 Holes)
JsonPath Match - All results must be 18 Holes
teetimes count in GetTeeTimesByCourse == TotalTeeTimes in GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries(Filtered by 18 Holes)

con:restRequest.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries - Unfiltered(compare to Filtered)

con:testStep.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries - Filtered(compare to Unfiltered)

con:restRequest.name: Test Request: GetCourseTeeTimesSummaries - Filtered(compare to Unfiltered)
